section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 2.0.5 Released
section.p: July 1st 2010- DataNucleus Access Platform 2.0.5 is released ("Bohr"). DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 2.0.5 includes the following changes

ul.li: Fix to persistence of BLOBs/CLOBs on Oracle for some corner-case relationships

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
